mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coin_bank(member_id, name, memo, angry_limit, reward, bank_account) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{name}, #{memo}, #{angryLimit}, #{reward}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m-%d-%h%m%s'))
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ap.phase), 0) FROM diary AS d LEFT JOIN angry_phase AS ap ON d.angry_phase_id = ap.id WHERE d.member_id = #{memberId} AND d.coin_bank_id = #{bankId};
SELECT c.bank_account as bankAccount, m.receive_todack_count as recieveTodackCount FROM member AS m JOIN coin_bank AS c WHERE m.id = #{memberId} AND c.id = m.coin_bank_id;

SELECT d.coin_bank_id as coinBankId, c.name as coinBankName, count(d.id) as diaryCount, sum(d.todack_count) as todackCount FROM diary AS d INNER JOIN coin_bank AS c ON d.coin_bank_id = c.id WHERE d.coin_bank_id IN (SELECT id FROM angrybox4.coin_bank WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) GROUP BY d.coin_bank_id;
